title: EP 94: The Big U Episode
itunes:title: EP 94: The Big U Episode
description:
On this episode of Gangster Chronicles we conversate with LA music mogul Eugene Henley also known as Big U. We discuss his non-profit "Developing Options" that does everything from facilitate activities for children to assist in finding jobs for the unemployed. We also discuss how he became involved in the music industry through his relationship with Kurupt and how he helped to shape the late Nipsey Hussle's image and career, and how West Coast Rapper The Game looked out for him in a major way. We then get a peep inside his new series "Hip Hop Untold" and Big U gets candid when we discuss his often misunderstood reputation . Press play to hear the rest.

Hit us up on Instagram @thegangsterchroniclespodcast

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On this episode of Gangster Chronicles we conversate with LA music mogul Eugene Henley also known as Big U. We discuss his non-profit "Developing Options" that does everything from facilitate activities for children to assist in finding jobs for the unemployed. We also discuss how he became involved in the music industry through his relationship with Kurupt and how he helped to shape the late Nipsey Hussle's image and career, and how West Coast Rapper The Game looked out for him in a major way. We then get a peep inside his new series "Hip Hop Untold" and Big U gets candid when we discuss his often misunderstood reputation . Press play to hear the rest.
